decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

P-1 (Building Boundary); P-2 (Existing and Proposed Block Plan); P-3 (Existing Floor Plans); P-4 (Existing Roof Plans); P-5 (Proposed Floor Plans); P-6 (Proposed Roof Plans); P-7 (Existing and Proposed Elevation Indications Plan); P-8 (Existing Elevations); P-9 (Proposed Elevations); P-10 (Proposed Elevations); P-11 (Proposed Elevations); Planning Statement (dated 16 May 2024)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

P-1 (Building Boundary); P-2 (Existing and Proposed Block Plan); P-3 (Existing Floor Plans); P-4 (Existing Roof Plans); P-5 (Proposed Floor Plans); P-6 (Proposed Roof Plans); P-7 (Existing and Proposed Elevation Indications Plan); P-8 (Existing Elevations); P-9 (Proposed Elevations); P-10 (Proposed Elevations); P-11 (Proposed Elevations); Planning Statement (dated 16 May 2024)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension; installation of one window to flank elevation
